Remember to update your list of blacklisted boards. The new cert has reset them.

This is probably a stupid idea, but couldn't the certificate for users be generated using their computer's own unique hardware id?
To keep it non-identifying you could hash the hardware id or do some other math wizard shit.
It would make it much more difficult to generate tons of certs for spamming.

posts.subject: 4chan being spammed
posts.body:
This is going to be a long post, you might want to grab a drink.
Today, shortly after epstein's suicide, I noticed an image being circulated on 4chan. It presents itself as an email from shareblue and contains some unusual terms and links that have been dead (And likely never existed - more on that later).
If we assume it is real, then the picture has been edited, as there is no window it is being displayed in (Browser, email client, etc.). I didn't give it any serious thought and ignored it.
Now, the filename this was posted with was stalwarts.jpg

After a few hours of seeing this being posted, I noticed it was in every single thread, typically the first or first few posts. And the file name was the same every time.
So I went to the archive and searched the filename.
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/search/filename/stalwarts/

Some autists or a combination of autists and bots have been posting this for hours, nonstop. As of this sentence, the count is up to 282 posts.
As you all should know, when you save an image from 4chan it is renamed to a series of numbers. This isn't organic, the file name is the same every single time.

I then noticed a new thread about this very topic, here's the archive link:
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/thread/222603814/

The mods deleted it before it could go anywhere terribly interesting, though it did start to fill up with shills spewing insults and unrelated comments.
The tl;dr part is that the links in the supposed "email" don't work and there is no archive or google cache of them. In all likelyhood they never existed. The mail address doesn't exist either, if you try to send an email it gets returned.
Another thread is made on the subject:
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/thread/222607404
And shit started to get interesting. Several posters consistantly delivering one-line responses, denying evidence that anyone who clicks on the archive link can verify.  I would recommend browsing through it to see for youself.
Numerous IDs enter the thread and seem strangely fixated on defending the legitimacy of the "email", disregarding that it's been spammed nonstop and ignoring allt he points made in the OP for a few posts until they are called out on it. More excuses, one line "you're retarded" insults, etc.
It devolves into nonsenical replies completely unrelated to the topic and seemingly unrelated to anything anyone was discussing, along with random accusations of "purple anon" and "morpheus".

Eventually OP gives up and drops it.

Now any time I post and question why this image has been spammed for several hours, with the same fucking filename, in every thread, I get a bunch of (you)s completely denying anything suspicious is going on along with accusations of being "moarpheus" and links to posts talking about TRS for some fucking reason.

I feel like I'm going nuts here anons. What the fuck is going on. This can't be normal, organic users spamming this shit and shutting down any conversation questioning it.

>>0ef4c3ea-4fb1-4dd1-878b-2c44d4a2a825
>One guy had public FTP server running w/ banner 'Hitler did nothing wrong'
This would have probably been me back in highschool lmao

>>0661d3ba-a17c-474c-acf2-07b88a1290b6
Who are you quoting?
Instead of a post number I get
>>8d5ff35f-aa4d-4954-8a39-26f7cd125d4bcb3858aed1a

>>17a0bd45-2835-42a7-8e8f-f84492d91d16
I was under the impression that sql injection was oldhat shit that no longer works in today's world.
Do you have any other resources that would be good to browse though?

Here we go again. It's the same brazillian as last night.
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/thread/222691875/
I did a search on the archive, he's been at it nonstop since last night.
It's like talking to a bot.

I swear to god they're fucking with me.
>how do you know it's a bot
because it's the same filename but the md5 hash changes every post and it's been spammed 300+ times
>but why is that suspicious
because normal posters don't do that
>it could just be people trying to spread the message
but the file name remains the same and the format of every post is the same
>so what if the file name doesn't change
file names change from the original when you save an image off 4chan, and if it was people just saving the image the md5 would be the same for every image but it changes
>the md5 is different because different ip addresses are posting it
that's not what an md5 hash is, it means the image has been intentionally edited every post for 300+ posts
>but how do you know it's a bot? why is that suspicious?

Going in circles with people playing stupid for 100+ posts is seriously demoralizing. They just loop back to their first question and ignore that it was already answered several times.

>>b0968e6b-cfb4-4901-9fa8-fc3886639c01
Thanks for all the effort m8, go enjoy your food.
This is going to be a great place one the bugs are worked out.

>>bea007f9-9900-44b6-95f0-b13111eb1ef2
Home made tap, it's the best.

>>460c7ff6-9d55-4039-8a46-7bd64d06b962
I'm having the same issue.
Good shit anon, I'll start seeding.
